Below is the course schedule for 2024 Summer Bootcamp. 

The morning session will run from 11:00 am--1:00 pm and the night session will run from 9:00 pm--11:00 pm (all times EDT/Toronto time).  

Zoom meeting information will be provided to all registered participants.
